description: A collection of cross reference text sources.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Creates a new cross reference text source.

parameters.description: The text or insertion point to create the source.
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Format used for cross reference source.
parameters.name: appliedFormat

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new CrossReferenceSource (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.name: add

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the CrossReferenceSource.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the CrossReferenceSources within the specified range.

parameters.description: The CrossReferenceSource, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: CrossReferenceSource, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The CrossReferenceSource, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: CrossReferenceSource, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first CrossReferenceSource in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last CrossReferenceSource in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle CrossReferenceSource in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the CrossReferenceSource that follows the desired CrossReferenceSource.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the CrossReferenceSource whose index follows the specified CrossReferenceSource in the collection.

parameters.description: The CrossReferenceSource whose index comes before the desired CrossReferenceSource.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any CrossReferenceSource in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every CrossReferenceSource in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CrossReferenceSource.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the specified index.

name: CrossReferenceSources
